canonMotion Class Reference

This class is for the canonical commands LINEAR_TRAVERSE, LINEAR_FEED, and ARC_FEED. canonMotion is an ABC. Its children should only be instantiated via canonLine::canonLineFactory(), which creates linearMotion objects for LINEAR_TRAVERSE and LINEAR_FEED commands, and helicalMotion objects for ARC_FEED commands. More...

Detailed Description

This class is for the canonical commands LINEAR_TRAVERSE, LINEAR_FEED, and ARC_FEED. canonMotion is an ABC. Its children should only be instantiated via canonLine::canonLineFactory(), which creates linearMotion objects for LINEAR_TRAVERSE and LINEAR_FEED commands, and helicalMotion objects for ARC_FEED commands.
